author: Amazon Customer "dennis8408"

review: Too underpowered. The interface is slow and stuttery. It can't change HDMI inputs like the Chromecast can, and the remote has almost no range at all, I have to have it within about 4 feet to even use it. No volume control at all on the remote either. Once it gets playing the video quality is ok for netflix and amazon. If you spend much time at all surfing through content choices it may drive you nuts, but it works.
